item.title: Shilpa Medicareâ€™s Raichur unit clears USFDA inspection with zero observations
item.description:
<![CDATA[The inspection, conducted from 10 March to 14 March 2025, concluded without the issuance of any Form 483. This marks the second consecutive clean inspection at the site.
Shilpa Medicare is a manufacturer of API, formulation, and development services. Shilpa Medicare (SML) started its operations as an API manufacturer way back in 1987 at Raichur, Karnataka, India.
The company had reported a consolidated net profit of Rs 31.78 crore in Q3 FY25, which is significantly higher as compared with the ...]]>
